reviewText: I love doing face exercise videos.  This is a very good one and easy to follow.  I have been doing face exercising with this dvd and Jack Lalanne's face exercises, and within a month's time, I have noticed a difference in the tone of my face and neck.  Face exercise does work; I am a believer :)
Have bought this before and really like it.  It works great if you are willing to put the time in to it!

I purchased this tape along with the advance exercise tape and discovered that both tapes could have been combined and still have room to spare. The demonstration is short and you would probably have to pause and do the exercise then restart. The advanced tape actually was just a sales pitch to purchased some of her product. The first tape said you will not need any creams yet on the second tape after a very very short  example of some exercises you are introduced to her product line

I am a visual learner. I couldn't understand most of what she was trying to explain in her book. The video shows you exactly what you need to do in order to do it the right way. It really does work. You get out of it what you put into it.
Effective excerises, but you must work at it.

I purchased her video 15 years ago and was expecting this to be an enlarged version. I was disappointed to find it is only an "advanced" version which does not include the original series. it was only 10 minutes long. VERY DISAPPOINTED!
It appears to be missing some of the additional exercises found in the rear of the book.
Fantastic resource at a great price!

She may know how to do the exercises well...but she is certainly not sharing it with others very well.  I bought her book and this...still don't know how to do some of the exercises...DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY..
I have been using these exercises on and off for about 15 years.  They are simple excercises and really make a difference in  a short period of time.
I purchased this video several years ago and loaned it to someone so I reordered. It definitely seems to tighten muscles when used daily.
